segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, isn't he?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he's about to fall off that stool any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he knows how dangerous that is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so expectant, like she's been waiting for this moment all day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both get what they want and climb down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so wobbly, it's making me nervous just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if their mom knows they're up to something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a bit tense, but I hope it all works out okay.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm sure they'll be happy once they get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
